title: Samplers of embroidery and crochet
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered in satin, fishbone, buttonhole, running, cross, and double running stitches, with deflected element work, withdrawn element work, and looping on plain weave foundation
description: Three embroidered samplers, a crochet sampler, and a tatting sampler all mounted on one piece.  Eight tatting patterns.  Ten crochet patterns.  One of the embroidered samplers is signed "P.S." "712".
name: Samplers of embroidery and crochet
